text: Thomas Ceccon (born 27 January 2001 in Thiene) is an Italian swimmer. He won the 50 m free style Youth Olympic title and 4 other medals at 2018 Youth Olympic Games in Buenos Aires. He participated to the 2019 World Aquatics Championships. He won two gold medals at the 2019 FINA World Junior Swimming Championships. == References == == External links == *Swimrankings Category:Italian male swimmers Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Swimmers at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Youth Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Italian male freestyle swimmers Category:Male backstroke swimmers
title: Thomas Ceccon
